Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:
my phone does not hold a charge, even with no usage, and the battery decreases by 20% in 2 hours.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The customer withdraws and makes a return.

Thank you for understanding,

Victoria from Back Market

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer. 

We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 40 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.

Thank you.

Regards, 
RK

Dear ecomobile

We would like to remind you that the response time for repair or replacement is 3 working days. If we do not receive a response from you with a valid tracking link within 24 hours, we will be obliged to refund the order.
Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter.

Yours faithfully

Mirana from the Back Care Team

Sorry for the previous message.

For rectification, the customer is expecting a full refund. If we do not receive an update from you after 24 hours, we will refund the order.

Thank you

Mirana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
TB
